colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024A *, ,(CES KUN RIG RNAM PAR SNANG MDZAD KYI CHO GA DBANG BCAS SHIN TU MDOR BSDUS BYANG GROL GSER ZAM ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, NANG DON THA SNYAD GANG LA'ANG GZHON NU NYID NAS 'GRAN ZLA BRAL ZHING GCIG TU THUGS KYI DGONGS PA BSTAN 'GRO'I DON LA GZHOL BA'I ^THO'U KVAN SPRUL PA'I SKU AER TE NI NO MON HAN RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYI MAS, DENG SANG KUN RIG GI DKYIL CHO GA NGAG 'DON 'DUL 'DZIN PA MDZAD PAS MDZAD PA SHIN TU LEGS SHING DAR RGYAS KYANG CHABS RGYAS 'DI LAS LHAG MED GOS KYANG, RGYUN 'DON LTA BU DANG BREL DUS SOGS LA GZHAN DON LANG BYED DGOS TSE SHIN TU NYUNG BDE ZHIG NYE BAR MKHO BAS, DE LTA BU ZHIG DGYIS ZHES NAN TAN CHEN POS 'GA' YANG YANG BSTZAL BA LA BRTEN NAS, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN CHUNG SUM PA MKHAN POS 'BRU MANG ZHES PAS STAG LOR BRIS PA'O, ,)
author_simple: SUM PA MKHAN PO YE SHES DPAL 'BYOR,
